item.title: What's new in PHP-ML 0.7.0

item.dc:creator: Arkadiusz Kondas

item.title: Design Patterns - Strategy
item.description: One of the main assumptions of good project programming is the 'Open/closed' principle, which says that classes should be closed for modification, but open to extension. The strategy pattern allows you to easily maintain this standard in your code.
item.dc:creator: Arkadiusz Kondas
